amendment.description: Amendment prohibits any funds from being obligated or expended for the purpose of providing assistance to Russia or any other state of the former Soviet Union to promote defense conversion, including assistance through the Defense Enterprise Fund.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to prohibit any funds appropriated under any Act of Congress from being obligated or expended for the purpose of providing assistance to Russia or any other state of the former Soviet Union to promote defense conversion, including assistance through the Defense Enterprise Fund.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Gilman amendment (A005) Agreed to by recorded vote: 249 - 171 (Roll no. 171).
